banner.heading: Your Strategic Partner in Building Research and Innovation Ecosystems
banner.desc: Knowledgex builds ventures from research, turns industry challenges into academic opportunities, and runs high-impact research projects. We help organizations innovate by developing custom innovation methodologies, building innovation hubs, and operating deep and tough tech accelerators.

ourWhy.title: Our Why
ourWhy.subtitle: From Knowledge to Business
ourWhy.desc: Our purpose is to bridge the gap between academic excellence and commercial relevance by building innovation ecosystems that empower research institutions, corporates, and emerging ventures to transform knowledge into market-ready solutions.

kofactor.title: What is KoFactor?
kofactor.description: An innovation enablement program that transforms research and scientific ideas into practical, market-ready solutions. It provides a structured journey helping participants develop early-stage concepts into commercially viable products, supported by expert mentors and hands-on workshops. The program focuses on fostering entrepreneurial thinking among researchers and innovators. It offers a collaborative environment connecting academia and industry. It serves as a platform to test and accelerate scientific ideas into scalable and sustainable business models.

objectives.title: Program Objectives
objectives.downloads: Transform scientific research into real-world impact
objectives.clients: Develop early-stage prototypes ready for testing
objectives.sessions: Design innovative and scalable business models
objectives.users: Bridge the gap between innovation and commercialization
objectives.files: Guide ideas toward market-ready products and solutions
objectives.places: Foster collaboration across research and industry

items.title: Rasid

items.title: Ai Naseem
items.description: A hybrid air conditioning system combining a mechanical vapor compression unit and an indirect evaporative cooling unit to cool and deliver supply air (SA) by separating sensible and latent heat removal
